import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quicky-test', templateUrl: './quicky-test.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quicky-test.component.css'] }) export class QuickyTestComponent { texto: string = ""; adicionar(event: any) { this.texto += event.target.value; console.log(this.texto); } } export interface PromptModel { assunto: string, materia: string, nivel: string, qtdquestoes: number, possuicontexto: boolean, }

Quicky Test

Message send and scroll to bottom enabled
